post.description:
Creates a global comment.

The user should have an internal right: MANAGE_GLOBAL_COMMENTS.

Request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/global_comments?reviewId=4993&parentId=1370

Example of request body:

 {
   "message": "",
   "mentions": [
     {
       "id": "",
       "uuid":"",
       "fullName": ""
     },
     {
       "id": "",
       "uuid":"",
       "fullName": ""
     }
   ]
 }

Example of a response body:

 {
     "id": 1371,
     "message": "some text",
     "modifiedAt": null,
     "sentAt": "2022-04-06T01:40:53Z",
     "sender": {
         "id": 371,
         "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
         "fullName": "firstName lastName"
     },
     "mark": "",
     "markLabel": ""
 }
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description:
parent global comment id, by default = null.

if parentId is null, it is comment.

if parentId is not null, it is a reply to comment and parentId is comment id.

404.description: Global comment parent is not found or has been deleted

put.description:
Updates a global comment.

The user should have an internal right: MANAGE_GLOBAL_COMMENTS.

Request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/global_comments?reviewId=4993

Example of a request body

 {
     "message": "@[firstName lastName](10771) some text",
     "mentions": [
          {
              "id":10771,
              "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
              "fullName": "John Doe"
          }
      ]
 }

Example of a response body:

 {
     "id": 1371,
     "message": "qwer",
     "modifiedAt": null,
     "sentAt": "2022-04-06T01:40:53Z",
     "sender": {
         "id": 371,
         "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
         "fullName": "firstName lastName"
     },
     "mark": "",
     "markLabel": ""
     "mentions": [
         {
             "id": 10771,
             "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
             "fullName": "firstName lastName"
         }
     ]
 }
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

requestBody.description:
message - global comment

mentions - list of IDs of the mentioned users

404.description: Global comment is not found or has been deleted

delete.description:
Deletes a global comment.

The user should have an internal right: MANAGE_GLOBAL_COMMENTS.

Request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/global_comments/1362
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

404.description: Global comment is not found or has been deleted

get.description:
Finds all review global comments.

The user should have an internal right: SEE_GLOBAL_COMMENTS.

Request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/global_comments/reviews/4993

Example of a response body:

 [
     {
         "id": 1360,
         "message": "1",
         "modifiedAt": null,
         "sentAt": "2022-04-05T08:16:19Z",
         "sender": {
             "id": 770,
             "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
             "fullName": "FirstName LastName"
         },
         "mark": "",
         "markLabel": "",
         "replies": []
     },
     {
         "id": 1361,
         "message": "2",
         "modifiedAt": null,
         "sentAt": "2022-04-05T08:16:22Z",
         "sender": {
             "id": 770,
             "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
             "fullName": "FirstName LastName"
         },
         "mark": "",
         "markLabel": "",
         "replies": []
     }
 ]
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

put.description:
Updates a comment mark.

The user should have an internal right: MANAGE_GLOBAL_COMMENTS.

Request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/global_comments/1370/_updateMark?mark=question

Example of a response body:

 {
     "id": 1370,
     "message": "message",
     "modifiedAt": null,
     "sentAt": "2022-04-06T01:38:57Z",
     "sender": {
         "id": 371,
         "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
         "fullName": "firstName lastName"
     },
     "mark": "QUESTION",
     "markLabel": ""
     "mentions": [
         {
             "id": 10771,
             "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
             "fullName": "firstName lastName"
         }
     ]
 }
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: mark
parameters.description:
not null, mark default value = "".

will be applied if only value from the possible mark list ("Get possible marks" GET request).

if contains another value will be set to empty string value.

404.description: Global comment is not found or has been deleted

post.description:
Creates ptfTron annotation. 
Request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/pdftron_annotations

Example of a request body:

 {
      "annotationUUID":"479f659f-f077-1a95-e77a-fd64b3ea4130",
      "pageNo":1,
      "parentUUID":null,
      "reviewIterationId":5820,
      "xfdfString":"xml annotation body"
 }

Example of a response body:

 {
      "xfdfString": "xml annotation body",
      "pageNo": 1,
      "annotationUUID": "479f659f-f077-1a95-e77a-fd64b3ea4130",
      "reviewIterationId": 5820,
      "parentUUID": null,
      "creatorId": 770,
      "creatorUuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
      "creatorFullName": "creatorFullName",
      "creationDate": "2022-04-05T03:50:28Z",
      "modifierId": null,
      "modifierFullName": null,
      "modificationDate": null,
      "contents": "",
      "deleted": false
 }
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

409.description: Parent pdfTron annotation is not exist

get.description:
Get list of possible annotation marks. 
Request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/pdftron_annotations/possible-marks
Example of a response body: 
     [
     {
         "id": "ACCEPTED",
         "localizedLabel": "Accepted"
     },
     {
         "id": "REJECTED",
         "localizedLabel": "Rejected"
     },
     {
         "id": "CANCELLED",
         "localizedLabel": "Cancelled"
     },
     {
         "id": "COMPLETED",
         "localizedLabel": "Completed"
     },
     {
         "id": "NONE",
         "localizedLabel": "None"
     }
 ]
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

200.description: List of possible annotation marks has been received

put.description:
Updates ptfTron annotation. 
     Request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/pdftron_annotations/8ec4f9eb-3c65-f22c-6cf7-8d91c7ebdbd1?isUndoRedo=false

Example of a response body:

 {
      "xfdfString": "xml annotation body",
      "pageNo": 1,
      "annotationUUID": "8ec4f9eb-3c65-f22c-6cf7-8d91c7ebdbd1",
      "reviewIterationId": 5820,
      "parentUUID": null,
      "creatorId": 371,
      "creatorUuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
      "creatorFullName": "creatorFullName",
      "creationDate": "2022-04-05T01:59:36Z",
      "modifierId": 371,
      "modifierFullName": "modifierFullName",
      "modificationDate": "2022-04-05T04:43:04Z",
      "contents": "122",
      "deleted": false
 }
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: isUndoRedo
parameters.description:
query parameter is optional and default value is set to false.

provides the possibility of updating a 'deleted' annotation by using the optional

query parameter.

409.description: PdfTron annotation had already been deleted. Can't update!

delete.description:
Deletes ptfTron annotation. 
     request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/pdftron_annotations/8ec4f9eb-3c65-f22c-6cf7-8d91c7ebdbd1?isCascade=false
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: isCascade
parameters.description:
Optional query parameter isCascade to give owner of annotation a possibility to delete all
replies if he deletes own annotation. Default value is set to false.
If isCascade is set to true and annotation type 'is reply' and even if reply creator != user id
who requested operation => replay will be deleted successfully if parent annotation creator
id == user id.

409.description: PdfTron annotation can be deleted by creator only!

get.description:
Gets list of review marks 
Request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/review-finder/_count-mark-types?moduleCode=16&advertInstanceId=15501

     ]
 }

request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/_create

 {

    "additionalInstance2":"21362",
    "briefingText":"",
    "dueDate":"",
    "mediaGUID":"25329",
    "title":"review title",
    "uploaderUuid": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001"
 }

    ]
 }

requestBody.description:
ReviewFormDto:

discriminator - if review creates from dse discussion discriminator = -1.

mediaVersion - asset version.

briefing - review briefing text.

additionalInstance - dse object id.

additionalInstance2 - dse discussion id.

briefingText - review briefing text.

dueDate - due date.

mediaGUID - media guid (asset id).

title - review title.

uploaderUuid - review uploader id. If not provided the current user will be the uploader.

post.description:
Creates new review object from dse asset selector variable. 
request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/_create-review-object

Example of a request body:

 {
    "participants":[

    ],
    "mediaGUID":25329,
    "briefing":"",
    "version":0,
    "dseObjectId":12032,
    "varTypeId":88867,
    "assetTitle":"review title",
    "uploaderUuid": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001"
 }

Example of a response body:

 {
    "id":5683,
    "instance":"-2",
    "name":"asset title",
    "additionalInstance":null,
    "additionalObjectId":null,
    "context":null,
    "startDate":"04/20/2022",
    "lastModificationDate":null,
    "mediaGuid":25329,
    "version":0,
    "objectId":null,
    "preview":null,
    "dueDate":null,
    "reviewState":null,
    "total":0,
    "totalSubmitted":0,
    "totalApproved":0,
    "totalWithChanges":null,
    "totalRejected":0,
    "totalPending":0,
    "includeYou":null,
    "user":false
 }
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

requestBody.description:
ReviewObjectDto:

participants - a list of users to be added as review participants.

mediaGUID - media guid (asset id).

briefing - review briefing text.

version - asset version.

dseObjectId - dse object id.

varTypeId - asset selector variable id.

assetTitle - review title.

uploaderUuid - review uploader id. If not provided the current user will be the uploader.

post.description:
Finds list of DSE variable type extended. 
Request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/_find-dse-variable-type-extended

Example of a request body:

 {
     "params": [
         {
             "mediaId": 2290,
             "version": 0,
             "dseObjectId": 28,
             "varTypeId": 2303
         }
     ]
 }

Example of a response body:

 [
     {
         "originalMediaId": 2290,
         "mediaId": 2290,
         "version": 0,
         "dseObjectId": 28,
         "varTypeId": 2303,
         "commentsCount": 0,
         "iteration": 1,
         "approvedCount": 0,
         "approvedTotal": 0,
         "state": "IN_PROGRESS",
         "canDoLikeOwner": "OWNER",
         "reviewId": 5264,
         "creationDate": "2022-04-06T09:04:58Z",
         "dueDate": null,
         "assetType": "Image",
         "assetTitle": "Asset Name",
         "assetCreationDate": "2022-04-06T09:03:40Z",
         "ownerId": 371,
         "ownerUuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
         "ownerName": "LastName, FirstName",

If mediaId, dseObjectId or varTypeId are incorrect, the list will be returned with value - null.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

requestBody.description:
list of DseVariableTypeReviewExtended params:

  • mediaId:media id (asset id).
  • version:asset version.
  • dseObjectId:dse object id.
  • varTypeId:dse variable type id.

200.description: List of DSE variable type extended has been found

post.description:
Finds review created from a dse job discussion. 
request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/_find-review

Example of a request body:

 {
     "discriminator": -1,
     "mediaVersion": "0",
     "additionalInstance": 12032,
     "additionalInstance2": "21362",
     "briefingText": "",
     "dueDate": "",
     "mediaGUID": "25329",
     "title": "review title"
 }

Example of a response body:

 {
    "discriminator":-1,
    "id":5686,
    "creationDate":"04/20/2022",
    "creator":{
       "id":9870,
       "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
       "fullName":"FirstName LastName",
       "email":"example@email.com"
    },
    "mediaInstance":0,
    "briefingText":"",
    "dueDate":null,
    "reviewStatus":"IN_PROGRESS",
    "latestReviewIteration":{
       "id":6256,
       "mediaVersion":0,
       "uploader":{
          "id":9870,
          "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
          "fullName":"FirstName LastName",
          "email":"example@email.com"
       },
       "iterationVersion":1,
       "mediaGUID":25329,
       "reviewId":null
    },
    "reviewIterations":{
       "1":{
          "id":6256,
          "mediaVersion":0,
          "uploader":{
             "id":9870,
             "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
             "fullName":"FirstName LastName",
             "email":"example@email.com"
          },
          "iterationVersion":1,
          "mediaGUID":25329,
          "reviewId":null
       }
    },
    "title":"",
    "version":0,
    "participants":[
    ]
 }
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

requestBody.description:
ReviewFormDto:

discriminator - if review creates from dse discussion discriminator = -1.

mediaVersion - asset version.

briefing - review briefing text.

additionalInstance - dse object id.

additionalInstance2 - dse discussion id.

briefingText - review briefing text.

dueDate - due date.

mediaGUID - media guid (asset id).

title - review title.

post.description:
Owner approves the review. 
request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/5593/_approve-owner

Example of a request body:

      comment: some text
      password:
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

Participant - reviewer approves the review. 
request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/5593/_approve-participant

Example of a request body:

      comment: some text
      password:
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

Participant - reviewer approves the review with changes.

Available if setting m.approved-with-changes.enabled = true.

request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/5593/_approve-with-changes-participant

Example of a request body:

      comment: some text
      password:
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

Owner rejects the review. 
request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/5593/_reject-owner

Example of a request body:

      comment: some text
      password:
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

Participant - reviewer rejects the review. 
request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/5593/_reject-participant

Example of a request body:

      comment: some text
      password:
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

Requests a new iteration. 
request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/5679/_request-iteration

Example of a request body:

 {
    "uploaderId":9870,
    "uploaderUuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
    "dueDate":"",
    "comment":"some text",
    "visibleAnnotations":[
       {
          "annotationId":"21296",
          "required":true
       }
    ]
 }
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

409.description: New iteration has been requested already

post.description:
Update review information.

Used in the old RM interface.

New rest for updating review information in new RM interface is:

updateReviewInfo(Integer reviewObjectId, UpdateReviewObjectDto updateParameters))

request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/5679/_update

Example of a request body:

 {
    "briefingText":"some text",
    "dueDate":"2022-12-12",
    "title":"review title"
 }
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

requestBody.description:
review parameters for updating.

briefingText - updates briefing.

title - updates review title.

dueDate - updates review due date. A date without a time-zone in the ISO-8601 calendar system, such as 2007-12-03.

post.description:
Uploads new asset. 
request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/5679/_upload-iteration

Example of a request body:

      form params: comment:some text
         password:
     mediaVersion:0
        mediaGUID:49133
__Security Roles Allowed:__ REVIEW_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

get.description:
Gets review description. 
request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/5686/description?languageTag=en-US

Example of a response body:

Media: M-25329 - review name, Context: test2 (J-11332)

request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/reviews/5686/document-code

get.description:

     "total": 3,
     "users": [

post.description:
Finds users by given parameters This method is no longer acceptable for searching review manager users. 
Use GET rm/rest/v1.0/users?query=Name instead.
request example: /rm/rest/v1.0/users
     query:user
     start:0
     limit:20
     id:-1

Example of a response body:

     {
     "total": 3,
     "users": [
         {
             "id": 11470,
             "uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001",
             "fullName": "FirstName1 LastName1",
             "email": "example1@email.com"
         },

         },

             "fullName": "FirstName3 LastName3",
             "email": "example3@email.com"
         }
     ],

 }
